body: An enthusiastic local spellcaster offers to use magic to temporarily enhance your employees' appeal and skills. If you spend 1d2 points of Magic, the building gains a +10 bonus on checks to generate gp or Influence for the next 2d6 days.
url: pfsrd://Ultimate Campaign/Rules/Downtime/Downtime Events/Dance Hall Events/Ballroom Magic
name: Ballroom Magic
